name: BackRabbit
description:
Controls:

A,D or Left arrow, Right arrow ----> Move

W, Up arrow or space, ---->Jump

This game was made for KenneyJam, using unity.

is a platformer game just 3 levels with a boss fight.

the theme for the jam was:

"It's a feature, not a bug!"

so, i decide to make the character move to the left for himself.

I forgot put a scape exit so use ALT+F4;
